name: You and Me (jiffelih)
description:
You find yourself in an unknown world. There's some kind of fungus all around you, including some growing in your chest. Even stranger is the figure approaching you. Whether it's friendly doesn't matter. You need to get out of here.

Created for Go Godot Jam 2021.

Controls: 

WASD - move

E/Left Click - interact

Esc - pause and menu
